m_szDocTitle: BATTERY, ELECTROLYTE LAYER, BATTERY PACK, ELECTRONIC APPARATUS, ELECTRIC VEHICLE, POWER STORAGE DEVICE, AND ELECTRIC POWER SYSTEM - Sony Corporation
m_szDocSumamry: BATTERY, ELECTROLYTE LAYER, BATTERY PACK, ELECTRONIC APPARATUS, ELECTRIC VEHICLE, POWER STORAGE DEVICE, AND ELECTRIC POWER SYSTEM United States Patent Application 20160043429 Kind                 Code: A1 Abstract: A gel electrolyte layer is provided between a positive electrode and a second electrode. The gel electrolyte layer is a layer containing particles, a resin material, and a polymer compound for retaining the resin material, and having a heat capacity per unit area of 0.0001 J/Kcm2 or more and a heat capacity per unit volume of 3.0 J/Kcm3 or less. Inventors: Download PDF 20160043429 Â
